alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 4:51PM PST until January 14 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...White Pine County and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures have struggled to remain above freezing late this afternoon. Temperatures are expected to decrease slightly through the evening increasing the potential for higher snow amounts, even in valley locations. Snow is expected to decrease beginning Sunday morning across the area including along US-50.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
